original_title: Sri Lanka PM denies resignation speculation
original_body_lines: ECONOMYNEXT – Sri Lanka’s Prime Minister Dinesh Gunewardena is not resigning, his media secretary said responding to media reports.
“There is no truth whatsoever  in the media reports that Prime Minister Dinesh Gunawardena would resign,” the statement said.
“Furthermore there has not been any request or pressure from any quarters for the Prime Minister to resign.”
There had been speculation that ex-President Mahinda Rajapaksa would be made Prime Minister, sometime in 2023.
Local government elections due on March 09 had been postponed after funding to the agency was squeezed. (Colombo/Feb26/2023)
